segments.text: This scene in the kitchen is just heartbreaking to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The poor woman is so absorbed in her dish drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea the water is flooding everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle is spreading, and it's going to ruin the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and dress might get soaked soon too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children, sneaking cookies like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool looks ready to collapse under him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, he could get hurt badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just egging him on with her outstretched hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets make the whole thing look even more precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window highlights all this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would notice and stop this before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is so serene, it's almost mocking the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
